      • createSecret

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> createSecret()
        Generates a 64 byte (512 bit) secret, best used with HMAC_SHA512
        Returns:
        A 64 characters random string based on SecureRandom

      • getTotp

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getTotp​(java.lang.String secret,
                                                           HmacShaAlgorithm hmacShaAlgorithm)
        Creates the current TOTP based on the given secret and HMAC algorithm
        Parameters:
        secret - The secret to use
        hmacShaAlgorithm - The HMAC algorithm to use
        Returns:
        The totp value or null if generation failed

      • verifiedTotp

        public static boolean verifiedTotp​(java.lang.String secret,
                                   java.lang.String totp,
                                   HmacShaAlgorithm hmacShaAlgorithm)
        Verifies a given TOTP based on a given secret and HMAC algorithm
        Parameters:
        secret - The secret to use
        totp - The TOTP to verify
        hmacShaAlgorithm - The HMAC algorithm to use
        Returns:
        True if the TOTP is valid, false otherwise

      • getQRCode

        public static java.lang.String getQRCode​(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String issuer,
                                         java.lang.String secret,
                                         HmacShaAlgorithm hmacShaAlgorithm)
        Generates a QR code to share a secret with a user
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the account
        issuer - The name of the issuer
        secret - The secret to use
        hmacShaAlgorithm - The HMAC algorithm to use
        Returns:
        An URL to google charts API with the QR code

        Parameters:

        secret - The secret to use
        hmacShaAlgorithm - The HMAC algorithm to use
        Returns:
